org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.scheduler

类 Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.scheduler.Scheduler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    InstanceListener, SlotProvider, SlotAvailabilityListener

    public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements InstanceListener, SlotAvailabilityListener, SlotProvider
    The scheduler is responsible for distributing the ready-to-run tasks among instances and slots.

    The scheduler supports two scheduling modes:

    • Immediate scheduling: A request for a task slot immediately returns a task slot, if one is available, or throws a NoResourceAvailableException.
    • Queued Scheduling: A request for a task slot is queued and returns a future that will be fulfilled as soon as a slot becomes available.

    • 嵌套类概要

      An entry in the queue of schedule requests.

    • 方法详细资料

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts the scheduler down. After shut down no more tasks can be added to the scheduler.

      • allocateSlot

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<SimpleSlot> allocateSlot(ScheduledUnit task,
                                                                       boolean allowQueued,
                                                                       java.util.Collection<TaskManagerLocation> preferredLocations)
        从接口复制的说明: SlotProvider
        Allocating slot with specific requirement.
        指定者:
        allocateSlot 在接口中 SlotProvider
        参数:
        task - The task to allocate the slot for
        allowQueued - Whether allow the task be queued if we do not have enough resource
        preferredLocations - preferred locations for the slot allocation
        返回:
        The future of the allocation

      • scheduleTask

                               throws NoResourceAvailableException
        Returns either a SimpleSlot, or a CompletableFuture.

      • getFreeSlotForTask

        protected SimpleSlot getFreeSlotForTask(ExecutionVertex vertex,
                                        java.lang.Iterable<TaskManagerLocation> requestedLocations,
                                        boolean localOnly)
        Gets a suitable instance to schedule the vertex execution to.

        NOTE: This method does is not thread-safe, it needs to be synchronized by the caller.

        参数:
        vertex - The task to run.
        返回:
        The instance to run the vertex on, it null, if no instance is available.

      • getNewSlotForSharingGroup

        protected SimpleSlot getNewSlotForSharingGroup(ExecutionVertex vertex,
                                               java.lang.Iterable<TaskManagerLocation> requestedLocations,
                                               SlotSharingGroupAssignment groupAssignment,
                                               CoLocationConstraint constraint,
                                               boolean localOnly)
        Tries to allocate a new slot for a vertex that is part of a slot sharing group. If one of the instances has a slot available, the method will allocate it as a shared slot, add that shared slot to the sharing group, and allocate a simple slot from that shared slot.

        This method will try to allocate a slot from one of the local instances, and fall back to non-local instances, if permitted.

        参数:
        vertex - The vertex to allocate the slot for.
        requestedLocations - The locations that are considered local. May be null or empty, if the vertex has no location preferences.
        groupAssignment - The slot sharing group of the vertex. Mandatory parameter.
        constraint - The co-location constraint of the vertex. May be null.
        localOnly - Flag to indicate if non-local choices are acceptable.
        返回:
        A sub-slot for the given vertex, or null, if no slot is available.

      • findInstance

        private org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Instance,Locality> findInstance(java.lang.Iterable<TaskManagerLocation> requestedLocations,
                                                                            boolean localOnly)
        Tries to find a requested instance. If no such instance is available it will return a non- local instance. If no such instance exists (all slots occupied), then return null.

        NOTE: This method is not thread-safe, it needs to be synchronized by the caller.

        参数:
        requestedLocations - The list of preferred instances. May be null or empty, which indicates that no locality preference exists.
        localOnly - Flag to indicate whether only one of the exact local instances can be chosen.
